title: Dosage
report: After extensive research about rivea, and extensive experience with LSD, mushrooms, chlorinated inhalents, and other various hallucinagens, aquired 100 seeds of this obscure morning glory cousin.  I took 75 to feel out the dosage, and got a mellow body high for about 4 hours. The seeds are tiny compared to heavenly blue, but about the same # per dose.

erowid.citation: Sloe1427. "Dosage: experience with Turbina Corymbosa seeds (ID 65086)". Erowid.org. Jan 10, 2009. erowid.org/exp/65086
